meanings.definition: A device or piece of software that can execute commands automatically.
meanings.sent1: The bots on the assembly line helped speed up production by following commands automatically.
meanings.sent2: I use bots to schedule my social media posts at specific times every day.
meanings.sent3: The bots in the game kept winning all the levels without any breaks!
meanings.sent4: The bots in the system worked tirelessly, like invisible helpers completing tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bots hummed softly as they efficiently carried out their programmed tasks.

meanings.definition: A type of computer program that performs repetitive tasks.
meanings.sent1: The bots in the game collected coins automatically as I played.
meanings.sent2: Many online platforms use bots to respond to frequently asked questions.
meanings.sent3: The bots in the program were like little helpers, doing the same tasks over and over.
meanings.sent4: The bots worked tirelessly, like diligent workers in a never-ending factory.
meanings.sent5: The bots clicked and typed with precision, repeating the same actions flawlessly.

meanings.definition: Short for 'robots', automated machines that can perform tasks autonomously.
meanings.sent1: The bots in the warehouse moved boxes without any human intervention.
meanings.sent2: Companies are increasingly using bots to streamline their operations.
meanings.sent3: The bots in the sci-fi movie were the heroes, saving the day with their autonomous actions.
meanings.sent4: The bots glided through the tasks effortlessly, like graceful dancers in a mechanical ballet.
meanings.sent5: The bots beeped and whirred as they independently completed their assigned duties.
